pages.text: $(li)The Brewing Stand is a block that allows you to brew potions.$(br)$(li)These will give you different effects depending of the potion used.

$(li)To use it, first you have to place this block and right click on it to access to its interface.$(br)$(li)Now, you have to place the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/blaze_powder)Blaze Powder$(/l) in the fuel slot.$(br)$(li)Then, you have to place the needed ingredients for your potion.$(br)$(li)Once the brew is finished, the resulting potions can be collected at the bottom of this interface.
